result.execSummary:
The defendant Eugene P Ferguson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Eugene P Ferguson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges. On one or more other charges, Eugene P Ferguson was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Eugene P Ferguson is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Eugene P Ferguson was found guilty of Arson of Building w/o Owner's Consent, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.02(1)(a).
  • Eugene P Ferguson was found guilty of Arson of Building w/o Owner's Consent, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.02(1)(a).
  • Eugene P Ferguson was found guilty of Burglary-Building or Dwelling, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: $3,001.43 Restitution, plus 10% surcharge of $300.14, for a total of $3,301.57.  Bond to be applied with outstanding balance to be paid through prison wages.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.
Must undergo a Mental Health assessement & comply with recommendations.

Not to have contact with Megan Warner or John Kriger.  
May not vote or hold public office until civil rights are restored.
Must complete AODA assessment & comply with recommendations.
$290.60 fine/cost on each Count (1 & 2), for a total of $581.20, to be paid through prison wage once Restitution is paid in full.
$250.00 DNA surcharge to be paid through prison wage once Restitution is paid in full.  Court finds Defendant indigent for additional DNA surcharge.

3:33 Defendant Eugene P Ferguson in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Defendant Eugene P Ferguson in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JP-clerk  Per ADA - no errors.  Per Atty Firkus yes and notes on record.  Per ADA in compliance with VR.  ADA addresses ct.  Atty Firkus addresses ct.  VI Statement by T.H.  VI Statement L.F. 

SENTENCING:  
Count 1 - 10 years.  5 years in, 5 years ES.  
Count 2 - 10 years 5 years in, 5 years ES concurrent with count 1
count 4 - withold sentence - probation for 7 1/2 years
not contact with MWarner or JKeiger.  AODA assessment and comply, undergo mental health assessment, Fine/Costs $290.60 on count 1.  plus $250.00 DNA surcharge.  
Count 2 Fine/Costs of $290.60 no DNA surcharge.  Ct finds DE indigent for addl. DNA charge. 
Count 4 - Fine/Costs of $290.60. no addl DNA surcharge.  Ct finds DE indigent for addl DNA charge. 

Ct orders rest. of $3,301.57.  Ct will apply bond to restitution.  Once rest. paid in full, fine/costs to be paid.   Can not posses firearm.  Can not vote. 128 days Sentence Credit.  Not eligible for boot camp.  Ct finds eligible for sub. abuse program.   4:33 adj.
